website_summaries.verdict: A fashionable, soft, and silky top ready for a hot Fourth of July celebration.
pros: A great tank that fits well
Flattering low scoop on the front
American flag pattern on the front and solid white fabric on back
Sleeveless with red, white, and blue stripes
cons: This shirt may shrink if not dried on the line

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very soft. I bought a medium after looking at the size chart I should have stuck to my size and got the small. The medium is long it covers my shorts completely and is large around the back of my neck. I would send it back but it will work for over my swim suit or around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: T-Back , comfy 4th of July Shirt.
customer_reviews.text: The description says "loose" took a chance & ordered it ,came on time but a little snug around my mid section. Purchased to wear on for 4th of July
customer_reviews.author: D. Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, cute, cute!! I normally wear a size 6 top in American sizes, and according to size chart I ordered this in a large, and it fits perfectly. Not tight and clingy, but not frumpy or baggy either. Soft comfy fabric. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindyann

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt! Only thing I disliked was the texture of the shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the smallest tank top size and it is too big for me especially the armpit section. I do not care to recommend it. I am 4'11" and the length is okay since I want to have it cover my buttocks.
customer_reviews.author: Montillo Dante

customer_reviews.title: Fits well XL
customer_reviews.text: XL fits fine for average size woman. Nice colors too.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Order size up!
customer_reviews.text: I so want to love this shirt, but it just didn’t fit right.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bradbury

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Looks nothing like the photo it’s to long and the flag is huge
customer_reviews.author: Stacy jones

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Don't understand some of the negative reviews. Mine fits fine and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: GABU

customer_reviews.title: I just love it, with a shirt underneath
customer_reviews.text: So cute, I just love it, with a shirt underneath. Scoop neck is a bit low. Other than that Great!
customer_reviews.author: L. Macomber

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect a cotton blend feel
customer_reviews.text: The fabric feels more synthetic than I'd hoped but overall I'm happy with the tank
customer_reviews.author: Rose
